PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-20612009-11-30,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectCBC/RADIO-CANADA and Ontrea Inc
PrecisOrder authorizing CBC/RADIO-CANADA pursuant to paragraphs 48. (2) (a) of the Broadcasting Act to dispose of two notes owed to CBC/Radio-Canada by Ontrea Inc. and two leases with Workplace Safety and Insurance Board (WSIB) Joint Venture and Simcoe Front Developments Limited by way of entering into one or more concurrent leases with a special purpose vehicle in respect of the lands leased to WSIB Joint Venture and Simcoe Front Developments Limited for a consideration in excess of four million dollars.
AttachmentsAttachment
